Package dao

Class ConcreteAppointmentDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.ConcreteAppointmentDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentDAO, Crud<Appointment>
public class ConcreteAppointmentDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements AppointmentDAO
Since:
1.0

Classe che implementa i metodi dell'interfaccia 'AppointmentDAO': AppointmentDAO Data Access Object. Serve a dialogare concretamente con il database.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ylenia Galluzzo, Matia Fazio
